title: Why is this meantality ok in normals?
body:
I'm getting real sick of this shit, its annoying watching your midlane die in an honest mistake, then they constantly keep running to the opponent and trying the same method that got them killed before, as if it was going to magically work this time. After they feed for like 3 times, you get this stupid message

**"Its just normal's it doesn't matter anyway"**

This is by far the most stupidest type of mentality, who cares if its normal's or ranked. The behavior that you display in normal's is the exact same shit you'll do in ranked if you cant effectively "practice and polish" your skills in a normal, you think your just gonna show out in ranked?

You think people play sports without practices? You think faker was just born making everyone else looking like shit without playing a shit ton of normal's? 

Sorry had to rant, after being held hostage by a troll duo..

replies.body: Im with the OP on this one. Doesnt matter if its normals or ranked, you should be trying to do well and win. Not screwing over your teammates cuz "youre just having fun."
It's not okay; that's negative attitude and a reportable offense.
i report them always, its just tiring to see :/

smh play a damn bot game.

I know i sound salty, but i just wanna play the game even if i cant control my teammates at least act like you care..

Thats the thing, even when i ask nicely same shit happens.
Im sick of this shit.
